home.title: Decentralized Cloud Foundation
home.subtitle: DCF (Decentralized Cloud Foundation) funds and incubates teams and projects, to build decentralized cloud technologies and applications of Web3.0.

program.title: Decentralized Cloud Foundation Initiatives
program.content: DCF has been funding the decentralized cloud storage project Crust Network since 2018, and will extend the effort to provide both financial and non? financial support to more projects and teams that drive technical innovation.

stack.title: Decentralized Cloud Storage Technologies
stack.content: You effectively enhance the value of the decentralized cloud by working on the following layers of technology.

apply.title: Application
apply.content: Crust Grants Program offers funding up to $30,000 for each recipient. In addition, it includes necessary technical and resource support to accelerate your project.
